name: Office Game Capstone 2020
description:
Office Game prototype by the Super Serious Game Capstone group for DU's Game Capstone 2020 class.

Note: Game designed primarily for gamepad, but Keyboard+Mouse works as well.

Gamepad Controls:

    Left Stick: Move

    Right Stick: Move Camera

    Bottom Face Button: Jump

    Left Face Button: Light Attack

    Top Face Button: Heavy Attack

    Right Shoulder Button: Toggle Sprint

    Escape: Pause

    Tab: Show UI

KB+M Controls:

    WASD: Move

    Mouse Move: Move Camera

    Spacebar: Jump

    Left Mouse Button: Light Attack

    Right Mouse Button: Heavy Attack

    Left Shift: Toggle Sprint

    Start/Options: Pause

    R2/RT: Show UI
